item.description:
My friend Janice and I are heading out for dinner and would love some company for dinner and drinks after. Come join us at the the Gardner Ale House. We plan to be there around 7:30-ish.

http://www.gardnerale.com/
item.how_to_find_us: I am wearing jeans, a black top with black hiking vest.....long brown hair.

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Dinner at the Gardner Ale House
